featured.text: Tai Chi Chuan is not only a physical but also a 19 exercise.
The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
People 16 Tai Chi mainly for its health benefits.
Relaxation and a feeling of joy are among the first noticeable differences in a Tai Chi student.

definition.zh_def: 中國的傳統醫學概念，指的是生命能量或氣場。
definition.en_def: A concept in traditional Chinese medicine referring to the vital life force or energy.
definition.example: Practicing tai chi helps to balance and enhance the flow of chi in the body.
